lead_paragraph: European football's ruling body UEFA has banned Turkey's Galatasaray from European competition for one year over its failure in following financial fair play regulations, Turkish broadcaster NTV said on Wednesday.

headline.print_headline: Turkey's Galatasaray Gets One-Year European Ban-Broadcaster NTV
headline.main: Turkey's Galatasaray Gets One-Year European Ban-Broadcaster NTV

snippet: European football's ruling body UEFA has banned Turkey's Galatasaray from European competition for one year over its failure in following financial fair play regulations, Turkish broadcaster NTV said on Wednesday....
